official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for the cost of insurance against negative outcomes from surgery, including against malpractice of a physician.
short_title: Freedom From Unnecessary Litigation Act of 2003

summary.text: Freedom From Unnecessary Litigation Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a credit for the cost of insurance purchased to cover the costs of a negative outcome from surgery; and (2) exclude from gross income medical malpractice awards granted in binding arbitration.

titles.title: Freedom From Unnecessary Litigation Act of 2003

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for the cost of insurance against negative outcomes from surgery, including against malpractice of a physician.
